title: Prices of Bread and Bakery products increased
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The price of a 450g loaf of bread will be increased by Rs. 30/- with effect from midnight today (19), said the All Island Bakery Owners Association.
In addition, the prices of other bakery products will be increased by Rs. 10/-.
